text: How does Kass teach Joey how to make a budget?
suggestion: She suggests making a plan and sticking to it i.e. budgeting. She gives an analogy of building a LEGO tower or a robot at STEM camp emphasising that he’d need both creativity and a budget to build!

text: How does she summarize their conversation to ensure Joey gets things done?
suggestion: She asks him a simple question:  what’s more important - the video game now or the STEM camp this summer?

text: How is Kass’ approach different from Joey’s?
suggestion: She suggests tweaking his savings goals to spend yearly on more important tasks as opposed to monthly on transitory wants.
